title: "The Practice of Energy Alignment and Harmonization Exercises"
first_phrase: The final part of the text explores practical exercises for developing and aligning the human body's vertical energy. By maintaining awareness of the body, specifically the ears, the body spontaneously aligns itself. This alignment leads to the discovery of the inner animality and life force. The magnetism of animals is closely related to this kind of verticality. The text also discusses the connection between spirit and matter and various exercises to revitalize the energy at the base of the spine. The section ends by discussing the symbol of the ram as the energy at the base of the spine and how simple exercises like circling and imagining a spiral can activate this energy.

last_phrase: Incorporating these exercises into your daily routine can help you connect spirit and matter, activate vital energies, and achieve a harmonious state of mind and body. Try the simple circonduzione exercise to vivify your base energy, visualize a moment of spring to access enthusiasm and decision-making power, and harmonize your energy with your environment using the armonizzazione exercise. Keep practicing and pay attention to your energetic sensations to experience the transformative power of these exercises.
